list.pageDescription: Scientific and practical materials on the use of ozone in agriculture, industry and the environment.

ozoneGrainProtection.title: Ozone as an environmentally safe protection for grain
ozoneGrainProtection.excerpt: Purdue University research showed that ozone effectively eliminates insects in grain storage facilities without harming grain quality or the environment.

ozoneVocStudy.title: Study of ozone effects on volatile organic compounds in enclosed spaces
ozoneVocStudy.excerpt: Research demonstrated that ozone effectively transforms low-molecular organic impurities in air into non-hazardous, non-toxic derivatives. Biotesting confirmed the safety of oxidation products.

aopWastewaterAgriculture.title: AOP and Wastewater. AOP in Agriculture
aopWastewaterAgriculture.excerpt: Application of Advanced Oxidation Processes (AOP) for wastewater treatment in aquaculture and agriculture. Ozonation reduced shrimp mortality from 80% to 20%.

grainDryingOzone.title: Intensification of Grain Drying Process with Ozone
grainDryingOzone.excerpt: The use of ozone-air mixture in shaft recirculation grain dryers reduces drying time by 1.5–2 times and provides energy savings of up to 19 t.e.f. per year.

concentratedOzoneAgriculture.title: Application of Concentrated Ozone in Agriculture
concentratedOzoneAgriculture.excerpt: Compact mobile concentrated ozone generators with capacity up to 10 kg/h enable disinfection of grain, feed, and poultry facilities in minutes instead of hours.

ozoneFoodInteraction.title: Ozone Interaction with Food Products
ozoneFoodInteraction.excerpt: Ozone as an oxidizer: effects on nutrients, bactericidal and antifungal activity, role of humidity and ethylene in food processing.

ozonePoultryFarming.title: Ozone in Poultry Farming. Introduction
ozonePoultryFarming.excerpt: Ozone applications in poultry farming: egg incubation, water and air disinfection, feed treatment, carcass decontamination. VNITIP research and global experience.

ozoneCovid19Treatment.title: Potential Use of Ozone in COVID-19 Treatment
ozoneCovid19Treatment.excerpt: Official ISCO3 expert opinion on ozone therapy as adjunct treatment for SARS-CoV-2: disinfection, mechanisms of action, clinical protocols.

ozoneSeedTreatmentResearch.title: Results of Ozone Technology Testing for Pre-Sowing Seed Treatment
ozoneSeedTreatmentResearch.excerpt: Long-term research demonstrated that pre-sowing treatment of seeds with ozone-air mixture increases yield by 15–20%, activates germination and accelerates plant development with minimal costs.

ozoneVirusDisinfection.title: Ozone Effects on Viruses and Bacteria
ozoneVirusDisinfection.excerpt: Mechanism of ozone's antiviral and bactericidal action: oxidative destruction of cell membranes, scientific research, and practical applications in disinfection.

poolVentilationDehumidifiers.title: Pool Ventilation: Wall-Mounted and Ducted Dehumidifiers
poolVentilationDehumidifiers.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to ventilation and dehumidification systems for indoor swimming pools. Humidity standards, dehumidifier types, heat pump technology, and ASHRAE recommendations.

ozoneCucumberGreenhouse.title: Ozone for Greenhouse Cucumber Cultivation
ozoneCucumberGreenhouse.excerpt: Research demonstrated that irrigation with ozonated water stimulates cucumber seedling growth, increases leaf area by 25–30%, improves seed yield, and eliminates nematodes without chemical fumigants.

ozoneCancerRiskReduction.title: Reducing Cancer Risk Through Air Purification
ozoneCancerRiskReduction.excerpt: Scientific research shows that cleaning workplace air from carcinogenic compounds (phenol, formaldehyde) can reduce cancer risk by 3–5 times.

ozoneDriedFruitsStorage.title: Ozone Application for Dried Fruits: Storage, Preservation, and Treatment
ozoneDriedFruitsStorage.excerpt: Scientific review of ozone application for dried fruit treatment: decontamination, aflatoxin and mycotoxin reduction, pesticide residue removal, shelf life extension for nuts, raisins, dates, and dried apricots.

ozoneGoldSilverMining.title: Ozone Applications in Gold, Silver and Metal Extraction
ozoneGoldSilverMining.excerpt: Scientific review of ozone technology in mining: pretreatment of refractory ores, enhanced gold leaching, silver recovery, and environmentally safe cyanide destruction in wastewater.

ozoneFoodWarehouseMeat.title: Ozone Applications in Food Warehouses and Meat Storage
ozoneFoodWarehouseMeat.excerpt: Comprehensive review of ozone technology in cold storage facilities, meat preservation, pathogen control, and adoption by major food service chains. FDA GRAS approved for direct food contact.
